findings.details: Found 2 nameservers: lucy.ns.cloudflare.com., mitch.ns.cloudflare.com.
findings.recommendation: Ensure multiple nameservers are properly configured for redundancy

findings.details: Multiple nameservers found but they appear to be in the same network
findings.recommendation: Deploy nameservers in different networks for better redundancy

findings.details: Nameserver allows recursive queries which could be used for DNS amplification attacks
findings.recommendation: Disable recursion on authoritative nameservers

findings.details: Nameserver allows recursive queries which could be used for DNS amplification attacks
findings.recommendation: Disable recursion on authoritative nameservers

findings.details: Both DNSKEY and DS records are present
findings.recommendation: Regularly rotate DNSSEC keys and monitor signature expiration

findings.details: DNS server does not support TCP transport
findings.recommendation: Enable TCP support for DNS queries

findings.details: DNS server does not support TCP transport
findings.recommendation: Enable TCP support for DNS queries

findings.details: Domain does not have CAA records to restrict certificate issuance
findings.recommendation: Implement CAA records to specify authorized certificate authorities

findings.details: The MX record points to 94 route2.mx.cloudflare.net which does not resolve
findings.recommendation: Remove or update dangling DNS records to prevent subdomain takeover

findings.details: Nameserver lucy.ns.cloudflare.com. does not support encrypted DNS queries
findings.recommendation: Consider implementing DNS over TLS for enhanced privacy

findings.details: Nameserver mitch.ns.cloudflare.com. does not support encrypted DNS queries
findings.recommendation: Consider implementing DNS over TLS for enhanced privacy

findings.recommendation: Consider implementing DANE TLSA records for enhanced TLS security

findings.details: Multiple subdomains show characteristics of domain generation algorithms
findings.recommendation: Investigate and monitor suspicious domain patterns

findings.details: Different record types have varying TTL values
findings.recommendation: Consider standardizing TTL values across record types

findings.description: Very low TTL for MX records
findings.details: TTL of 284 seconds might cause excessive queries
findings.recommendation: Consider increasing TTL unless required for rapid updates
